xml.data:
Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 12 Kilesagocchaka » 12.8 Kilesavippayuttasaṃkilesikaduka
12.8.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Kilesagocchaka
Kilesavippayuttasaṃkilesikaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
98.
4053Kilesavippayuttaṃ saṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesavippayutto saṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  kilesavippayuttaṃ saṃkilesikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ…pe…  dve khandhe…pe… .
4054(Yathā lokiyadukaṃ, evaṃ ninnānākaraṇaṃ.)
Kilesavippayuttasaṃkilesikadukaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
4055Kilesagocchakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
<< 12.8 Kilesavippayuttasaṃkilesikadukaup13 Piṭṭhiduka >>
